Flesh Eater

one handed weapon (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 86
berserk when wounded [berserk]: +3
weap id [weapon]: 149 (Flesh Eater)
damage [dmg]: 14
attack [att]: +4
defence [def]: -1
length [len]: 1
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
 
(Slashing Damage [slash], Magic weapon [magic])

Extra effect on damage: Chest Wound

weap id [weapon]: 150 (Chest Wound)
damage [dmg]: Special
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
 
(Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 5B to forge (B1)

This is an axe that has been trained to yearn after human flesh. Once it tastes the blood of an enemy, it will quickly devour the victim, resulting in a permanent chest wound. The wielder of this axe will yearn for combat and, if wounded, might go berserk.
